Same materializing key problem here. ANY IDEAS HOW TO FIX IT????

Found out the problem. The Materialization issue is caused by a progression bug that was included in the beta version of the game. This is the Beta (pre-release) version that was shared. So someone has to upload the latest release of this game in order for it to work.

Apparently downloading it from Big Fish Games or Frogwares resolves the issue.
